It is just user defined enum where each member defines an individual storeable type.

Have matter only integer value of this member.

=Example=
<code language="cs">
enum EStoreKind
{
	ALL = 0,
        MONSTER_INFO = 1,
        TILE_INFO = 2,
        TILE_SET = 3,
        NICKS_INFO = 4,
        TERRAIN_SET = 5,
        COLOR = 6,
        THING_INFO = 7
}
</code>
